titles.title: Real Cost of Handgun Ammunition Act

A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase the tax on handgun ammunition, to impose the special occupational tax and registration requirements on importers and manufacturers of handgun ammunition, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S14958-14959)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S2184)

bill.summary: 11/3/1993--Introduced. Real Cost of Handgun Ammunition Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase the excise tax on certain ammunition. Imposes a special (occupational) tax on importers and manufacturers of certain handgun ammunition for each place of business.
